description.translate: Greater title than zinc saucier, but twice cheaper.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Toque de fer\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Plus prestigieux que saucière de zinc,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7mais deux fois moins cher.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Greater title than zinc saucier,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7but twice cheaper.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1 §7HUN§c-1\"}"]}}
